## Southern Elephant seal
something quick about the data here. Sentence about fitting `rw` and `crw` models then show code for fitting:
```{r ellie SSM}
fit.rw <- fit_ssm(ellie, vmax=4, model="rw", time.step=12, verbose=0)
res.rw <- osar(fit.rw)

fit.crw <- fit_ssm(ellie, vmax=4, model="crw", time.step=12, verbose=0)
res.crw <- osar(fit.crw)
```

```{r Fig1, echo=FALSE, fig.width=8, fig.height=4, out.width="\\linewidth", fig.cap="\\label{fig:ellie}Ellie ex."}

p1 <- plot(res.rw, "qq") + theme_minimal()
p2 <- plot(res.rw, "acf") + theme_minimal()

p3 <- plot(res.crw, "qq") + theme_minimal()
p4 <- plot(res.crw, "acf") + theme_minimal()

(p1 | p2) /
(p3 | p4)
```
